g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div><div id="glb-corpo" class="glb-corpo"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="row show-for-medium-up"><div class="column
                    small-24
                    medium-24
                    large-24 large-offset-0
                    xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_slb_topo"><div id="banner_slb_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="areatemplate-topo row-full-width"></div><div class="row"><div class="small-24 column areatemplate-showtime"></div></div><div class="row"><div class="areatemplate-meio
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-24 large-offset-0
                xlarge-22 xlarge-offset-1"></div></div><div class="row small-collapse medium-uncollapse"><div class="areatemplate-direita-superior
                    column
                    medium-20 medium-offset-2 medium-pull-2 
                    large-9 large-offset-0 large-pull-0
                    xlarge-7 xlarge-offset-1 xlarge-pull-1
                    float-right"></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda
                column
                medium-20 medium-offset-2
                large-15 large-offset-0
                xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1"><script type="text/javascript">SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN={PORTAL:'G1',FEED_TYPE:'FOLDER',DEVICE_GROUP:'desktop',IS_PHOTO_PRIORIZED:false,IS_RECOMMENDED:false,FALKOR_URL:'http://falkor-cda.bastian.globo.com',RECOMMENDATION_URL:'http://recomendacao.globo.com/rec/v2/user?client_id=g1',HORIZON_HOST:'http://horizon.globo.com',PUSHSTREAM_HOST:'stream.push.globo.com',};BastianVersion='1.10.0-rc10';</script><script>SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN=SETTINGS.BASTIAN||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN["AB_HOST"]="globo-ab.globo.com"</script>

desktops.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div <script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];

    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div               </a>

                <span class="name hidden-sm"><a sib-player-urls team="player.teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ player.playerProfile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="player.playerProfile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.lastName"></span></a></span>
                <span class="name visible-sm"><a sib-player-urls team="player.teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ player.playerProfile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.firstInitial"></span><span data-ng-show="player.playerProfile.firstInitial"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.initialLastName"></span></span><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.lastName"></span></a></span>
                <span class="team-name"><span class='jersey-no'>{{ player.playerProfile.jerseyNo }}</span> {{ player.playerProfile.position }} / {{ player.teamProfile.displayAbbr }}</span>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-lg-1 col-sm-1 col-1 pct">
              <span class="pct">{{ player.value }}</span>
            </div>
            <div class="col-2 hidden-sm team-img">
              <a sib-team-urls team="player.teamProfile" data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ player.teamProfile.code }}">
                <sib-img-team team-abbr="player.teamProfile.abbr"></sib-img-team>
              </a>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="row list-row spacer-row">
            <div class="col-2 rank"></div>
            <div class="col-lg-8 col-sm-8 col-8 player"></div>
            <div class="col-2 hidden-sm team-img"></div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div> <!-- end last game toggle -->
  
  <div class="season-leaders" data-ng-show="tabbed=='season'"> <!-- Showing last game toggle -->
    <div class="sib3-tabs">
      <div class="sib3-tab" data-ng-class="{active: category=='points'}" data-ng-click="setSeasonCategory('points')"><span data-ng-i18next="_stats.PPG"></span></div>

                <h3 class="name"><span data-ng-bind-html="starPlayer.playerProfile.lastName"></span></h3>
              </a>
              <h5><span class='jersey-no' >{{ starPlayer.playerProfile.jerseyNo }}</span> {{ starPlayer.playerProfile.position }} / <span class='team-city' data-ng-bind-html="starPlayer.teamProfile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="starPlayer.teamProfile.name"></span></h5>
              <h3 class="pct">

          </div>

	      </div>
	
	      <div class="last-chg">
	        <span class="info-label">
	          <span data-ng-i18next="whosHot.last5"></span> / <span data-ng-i18next="whosHot.pctChg"></span>
	        </span>
	        <span class="last-5">{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].last5 }}</span>
	        <span class="change">
	          <span class="lighter">/</span> 
	          <span class="blue">{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].differential | number:1 }}%</span>
	        </span>
	      </div>
	
	      <a data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile.code }}" sib-team-urls team="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile"><sib-img-team team-abbr="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile.abbr"></sib-img-team></a>
	    </div>
	    <div class="row list-headers">
	      <div class="col-2 rank" data-ng-i18next="whosHot.rank"></div>
	      <div class="col-5 player" data-ng-i18next="whosHot.player"></div>
	      <div class="col-5 last-chg"><span data-ng-i18next="whosHot.last5"></span> / <span data-ng-i18next="whosHot.pctChg"></span></div>
	    </div>
	    
	    <div class="row list-row visible-sm">
	      <div class="col-2 rank">{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].rank }}</div>
	      <div class="col-5 player">
	        <a sib-player-urls team="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.code }}">
	          <sib-img-player class="player-img-small" size="small" type="head" player-id="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.playerId"></sib-img-player>
	        </a>
	        <div class="player-info">
	          <span class="name hidden-sm"><a sib-player-urls team="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span data-ng-bind-html="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.lastName"></span></a></span>
	          <span class="name visible-sm"><a sib-player-urls team="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.firstInitial"></span><span data-ng-show="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.firstInitial"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.initialLastName"></span></span><span data-ng-bind-html="whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.lastName"></span></a></span>
	          <span class="team-name"><span class='jersey-no'>{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.jerseyNo }}</span> {{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].playerProfile.position }} / {{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].teamProfile.displayAbbr }}</span>
	        </div>  
	      </div>
	      <div class="col-5 change">
	        <span class="last5">{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].last5 }}</span>
	        <span class="chg">
	          <span class="lighter">/</span>
	          <span class="blue">{{ whosHot.reboundHotPlayers[0].differential | number:1 }}%</span>
	        </span>
	      </div>
	    </div>
	
	    <div data-ng-repeat="player in whosHot.reboundHotPlayers.slice(1,5)">
	      <div class="row list-row">
	        <div class="col-2 rank">{{ player.rank }}</div>
	        <div class="col-5 player">
	          <a sib-player-urls team="player.teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ player.playerProfile.code }}">

	          </a>
	         <div class="player-info">
	           <span class="name hidden-sm"><a sib-player-urls team="player.teamProfile" data-ng-href="/players/#!/{{ player.playerProfile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.firstName"></span><span data-ng-show="player.playerProfile.firstName"><span data-ng-i18next="delimiter.firstNameLastName"></span></span><span data-ng-bind-html="player.playerProfile.lastName"></span></a></span>

	         </div>

	          <span class="last5">{{ player.last5 }}</span>

	            {{ player.differential | number:1 }}%
	          </span>
	        </div>

	      <div class="col-5 change"></div>
	    </div>
	  </div>

                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="glb-grid-2 large-2 column">
                
                <ul class="divisoria">
                
        

                    <li class="diretorio-indice">
                        
                            <strong>Institucional</strong>
                        
                    </li>


                        


                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://www.grupoglobo.globo.com/" >Grupo Globo</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/videos/campanhas" >Campanhas</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://globosatcomercial.globo.com/" >Como Anunciar</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/como-assistir.html" >Como Assistir</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/institucional.html" >Mundo do SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/politica-de-privacidade.html" >Política de Privacidade</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/sobre-o-sportv.html" >Sobre o SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/rio-2016/noticia/2016/02/globosat-realiza-processo-seletivo-para-os-jogos-olimpicos-do-rio.html" >Trabalhe Conosco</a></li>
                            


                        

    
                </ul>
            </div>

         </div>
    </div>
</div>
